TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED BANKSHARES <ALBN> OFFERS STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Allied Bankshares Inc said it offered 500,000 shares of stock at 12.50 dlrs a share. The offering is underwritten by Johnson, Lane, Space, Smith and Co Inc and Interstate Securities Corp. Reuter
